channel.description:
What are your thoughts? Terrorists or government?
6 year anniversary, and thoughts?

item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:117, topic:142335”][quote author=Stroud link=topic=194760.msg1776204#msg1776204 date=1190583527]
First of all, here’s an example, Pearl Harbor!
The government needed a new Marines because they weren’t doing a good job, and if the government were to just fire them all it would cause a lot of controversy
Every single militia was stationed at Pearl Harbor, every single last one of them,
Then, it gets bombed, while the government sends no security whatsoever to protect them,
Then luckily for the government, they get a new and better Marines.
[/quote]Thats lovely, all we need is more conspiracy’s about Pearl Harbor.

[quote author=Stroud link=topic=194760.msg1776204#msg1776204 date=1190583527]
In 9/11, i think George Walker Bush knew that the terrorists we’re going to do that, because they took no precaution whatsoever, to protect the twin towers, even when they knew something was going to happen.[/quote]You just told us that the President knew that the terrorists where going to land a plane into twin towers. How the fuck would he know that?

[quote author=Stroud link=topic=194760.msg1776204#msg1776204 date=1190583527]
Another example, how the Government controls what we watch!
The government, makes cartoons in which “Indians” (native americans) are screaming bloody war cries, and shooting arrows at us,
While the Government knew we pushed them out of their land even when they offered to share it with us,
All teens and adults KNOW that, flat out,
The government puts that in cartoons to change children’s thoughts of the government, “Oh now I know why we took their land, they were nasty old arrow shooters!”
[/quote]No comment.[/quote]

i agree with you exe. theres the popular beliefs, conspiristists beliefs and then your beliefs lol. they are pretty far outthere.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Stroud, post:112, topic:142335”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=194760.msg1776207#msg1776207 date=1190583630]

The 9/11 was awful, many 100’s of people died, I say the people that did the 9/11 should go to hell.

Music

This may sound mean but…

Cry me a river,
Build me a bridge,
AND GET THE FUCK OVER IT!

about 3,000 people died…thats a drop in the ocean.

estimated deaths are:

1.78 deaths per second

107 deaths per minute

6,390 deaths per hour

153,000 deaths per day

56.0 million deaths per year

so 9/11’s actual death toll is basically shit…more people die in an hour around the world.
[/quote]

agreed dude…

also, just to liven ur post up!
every 18 seconds a baby is born!
also, the american government did it for sure, read my post a few up[/quote]
I dont care who did it.

I just want every1 to stfu about and and cry over it

THE DEATH COUNT WAS TINY!!! Its not like a nuke was dropped wiping out entire NYC…
People need to get over it…and stop using it as an excuse.

item.dc:creator: @Stroud Stroud
item.description:
@Stroud wrote:

These are my thoughts, with some examples, alright?

Don’t flame me, btw

First of all, here’s an example, Pearl Harbor!
The government needed a new Marines because they weren’t doing a good job, and if the government were to just fire them all it would cause a lot of controversy
Every single militia was stationed at Pearl Harbor, every single last one of them,
Then, it gets bombed, while the government sends no security whatsoever to protect them,
Then luckily for the government, they get a new and better Marines.

In 9/11, i think George Walker Bush knew that the terrorists we’re going to do that, because they took no precaution whatsoever, to protect the twin towers, even when they knew something was going to happen.

Another example, how the Government controls what we watch!
The government, makes cartoons in which “Indians” (native americans) are screaming bloody war cries, and shooting arrows at us,
While the Government knew we pushed them out of their land even when they offered to share it with us,
All teens and adults KNOW that, flat out,
The government puts that in cartoons to change children’s thoughts of the government, “Oh now I know why we took their land, they were nasty old arrow shooters!”

Think it over, i could keep going on and on and on about examples of how the Government sets things up.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:86, topic:142335”]It is in the past

Like I said, you imply it.

Calling me 12 is just stupid.[/quote]

Then stop acting like it.

And http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=7866929448192753501

Another great movie.

But all were talking about are the towers, What about the pentagon?

Look Closely…Do you see what I’m seeing? Let’s think here…Boeing 757 holds around (757-200) 11,275 gal (42,680 L) - (757-300) 11,465 gal (43,400 L) of Jet fuel and not burn any of the things in this picture
.
Hmm, Get some Professional photo viewers or whatever, because in this picture, there is a computer on top of a filing cabinet (top floor), Wooden desk on the second floor, And on the third floor there is a book on a wooden book holder, All of these things, untouched, or Burned?

http://www.aerospaceweb.org/aircraft/jetliner/b757/ To see my proof on jet fuel.

Also other things to consider :

*  How does a 65 ton Boeing 757 with a 125 foot wingspan fit through a single 16 foot hole in the side of the Pentagon leaving virtually no wreckage?
* There is no evidence of a Boeing 757, seats, wings, engines, luggage or the dead passengers at the Pentagon.
* The Pentagon security video suggests a missile explosion rather than a jet fuel explosion.
* There is a hole through 3 rings of the Pentagon, totaling 9 solid feet of steel reinforced concrete the object would have to penetrate, and experts believe this to be very unlikely.

Read full topic
